title: "Social entrepreneurship: How start-ups use artificial intelligence for social good"
excerpt: "Researchers at the Alexander von Humboldt Institute for Internet and Society (HIIG) have studied how entrepreneurs use artificial intelligence (AI) to help tackle social problems. In a new study, they point to the organisational uniqueness of start-ups and how they act as a bridge between different communities of interest in areas such as inclusion,"
